resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

pitrou commented on a change in pull request #12592:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12592#discussion_r822775849



##########
File path: python/examples/minimal_build/README.md
##########
@@ -24,32 +24,32 @@ an eye toward maximum portability across different Linux distributions. This
 may help for contributors debugging build issues caused by their local
 environments.
 
-## Fedora 31
+## Fedora 35

Review comment:
       Note: we should perhaps test those minimal builds as part of our nightly builds, but that's outside the scope of this PR.




--

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description: The standard {{venv}} module is enough to create virtual environments without installing the {{virtualenv}} module. It will also solve virtualenv installation issues on some setups such as macOS wheel builders.
fields.summary: [CI][Python] Use venv, not virtualenv, in CI
